public final class Tube
extends Geometry

Author:
WestLangley / https://github.com/WestLangley, zz85 / https://github.com/zz85, miningold / https://github.com/miningold Modified from the TorusKnotGeometry by @oosmoxiecode Creates a tube which extrudes along a 3d spline Uses parallel transport frames as described in http://www.cs.indiana.edu/pub/techreports/TR425.pdf
